text:
@realDonaldTrump The Fed can't solve CoVID19 and neither can you. It's going to get much worse.

Your people can't even get testing right. You have no plan for the treatment of 10s of  thousands.

Chances are you might even get it.

Market still falling like a stone. Cutting interest rates stupid
